name: Kyung Hoi (Joseph) Min
title: Computational Biologist. Software Engineer.
introduction: I am passionate about the application of computer science to the biological sciences. As an undergraduate double-majoring Biology and Computer Science at Caltech, I develop software applicaitons that automate biological data anlysis and allow scientists to take full advantage of the massive amount of data generated by modern biological methods. My specific interests include bulk and single-cell RNA-sequencing.
